    • Constructor Detail

      • Configuration

        public Configuration​(java.lang.String[] args)
        create a configuration based on given command-line options. The program reads in the command line options. Next, if "-i file" is given, options are read from the file. Options given on the command line override any options in the options file.
        Parameters:
        args - - command line options
